mainDesc: This word perfectly captures  the spirit of our journeys - energy, drive and inspiration
mainDescBottom: We don't just organise driving tours, we create moments  that spark change, fuel new emotions, and open up new horizons. Each run is not just a trip, but a part of a greater journey filled with unforgettable experiences and endless discoveries
mainHeroDesc: Unique road trips for entrepreneurs and experts from various fields
privateHeroDesc: Personalised sports car journeys with a route designed just for you.
businessHeroDesc: Personalised sports car journeys with a route designed just for you.
descBusinessTopTitle: Imagine you and your business partners or team
descPrivateTopTitle: Immerse yourself in a journey with
descBusinessAnimatedTitle: driving a Lamborghini or Ferrari carving through the
descBusinessBottomTitle: scenic curves of Europe’s finest roads.
descPrivateBottomTitle: where everything is created according to your personal scenario
descPrivateAsideDesc: Our private tours offer a chance to escape the routine, enjoy a change of scenery, and experience every kilometre of Europe's finest roads behind the wheel of a luxury sports car – whether with your significant other or a group of close friends.
descBusinessAsideDesc: There are breathtaking landscapes all around, and busy days ahead, filled with emotions, colourful activities and quality networking. Have you imagined it? And we will make it a reality, relieving you of all organisational worries:
galleryTitle: Hundreds of clients who have put their trust in us
Хотите другую машину? При оформлении зая: Prefer a different car? Share your preferences when booking, and we'll select the perfect vehicle tailored to you
Мы позаботились о том, чтобы у нас были: From lightning-fast supercars to sleek premium sedans, we've made sure there's something for every taste
tariffs_desc: Personalized tours are the perfect way to choose your own sportscar travel dates for your important events
business_desc: For team building and business meetings with partners
private_desc: For couples, friends and special occasions
essence_title: The essence of the Impulse  Through the eyes of the founder
essence_desc: From lightning-fast supercars to sleek premium sedans, we've carefully curated a fleet to suit every taste
mission_desc_1: Comfort and personal care for every guest —
mission_desc_2: is our highest priority. Our trusted partnerships allow us to create exceptional experiences and ensure the highest level of comfort throughout your journey.
services_desc_1: Breathtaking aerial views, vivid emotions, and a unique chance to see the most beautiful parts of the route from a perspective few ever experience from the ground
services_desc_2: Elegant rooms in hotels that meet the highest standards of premium vacation
services_desc_3: Immerse yourself in a world of unique flavors with exquisite dishes and signature cuisine
services_desc_4: The best moments of your trip captured with unsurpassed skill and unique style
services_desc_5: A unique detail for complete immersion in exclusivity
services_desc_6: A personal touch that complements the travel atmosphere

form_checkbox: I agree to the Privacy Policy
contactFormTitle: Leave your contacts, and we'll get back to you to discuss all the details and answer any questions you may have
footer_desc_1: Impulse. This word perfectly reflects the essence of our journeys — energy, drive, and inspiration.
footer_desc_2: We don’t just organize road trips; we create moments that become an impulse for change, new emotions, and discoveries.
tour_swiper_desc_1: This five-day adventure begins in Munich and takes you along Germany’s famous autobahns, through the majestic Dolomite Alps, and into legendary Italian cities
tour_swiper_desc_2: The tour concludes in Bologna, where you’ll visit the Lamborghini Museum and celebrate the finale in a luxurious castle with live music and gourmet cuisine
tour_slide_1_desc: Enjoy breathtaking routes, conquer legendary mountain passes and test the power of sports cars on limitless autobahns
tour_slide_2_desc: Visit the Lamborghini and Ferrari museums, feel the atmosphere of Bologna and savor gourmet cuisine in a castle
